amendment.description: An amendment numbered 70 printed in House Report 113-170 to prevent further construction or expansion of existing facilities at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 237 (Roll no. 409).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
